titleStmt.title: A godlie sermon preched before the Queenes Maiestie at Grenevvich the 26. of March last past by Doctor VVhitgift Deane of Lincolne.
titleStmt.author: Whitgift, John, 1530?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Henry Bynneman, for Humfrey Toy,

notesStmt.note: "Seen and allowed according to the order appoynted."
Signatures: first 2 p. unmarked, A-B⁸, C⁴.
Reproduction of original in: All Soul's College (University of Oxford). Library.
